note:
Morty, She/Her pronouns, 24 years old, cis woman, mixed light-skinned (black+white), living on Guarani land. (Actually a bat, trust me)
Cartoonist, furry, lover and hater of things.

Do not follow or interact if you're under 18 years old, if you're a SocDem, is DDLG, consumes NSFW of children/teen characters and animals (including other four-legged fantasy creatures).

Feel free to follow request even if we never interacted with each other!
